item.description:
Palmer Center Cemetery, (or the "Hidden Cemetery") Palmer, MA
Palmer Center Cemetery in Palmer, Massachusetts, or what we have always fondly referred to it as "The Hidden Cemetery", is a small,
out of the way burial ground that is a hotbed of paranormal activity.The cemetery is located at the base of Flynt Street and Route 32 in Palmer. There is no driveable access road into the cemetery itself, one must park on Flynt Street and walk a short distance along a defunct road branching off of Flynt Street. (This defunct road was blocked off by large rocks as of 2002).
There is another entrance which is gated, near Burleigh Park.The Hidden Cemetery contains very old graves dating back to early 1700, the newest being 1997. WE SILL HOPE TO SEE THE "grey lady"
item.name: PALMER HIDDEN CEMETARY
